item.description:
Buona Domenica Amici!

Che bella giornata oggi! Spero che avete l'opportunita di essere fuori di casa.

What a beautiful day it is today! I hope you have the opportunity to be outside today.

Over the last six months a couple of members have suggested this wonderful vineyard in Wallingford, CT called Gouveia Vineyards.




At our last meetup, Frank Capone decide to look into this. Well here's what Frank uncovered in his own words.

"We should arrive by 4:00 to get good seating.
Everyone brings something good to eat ( a little extra) and
it's best if we do "pot luck" type thing. Someone, I could
volunteer , to organize a food list, so we don't end up with 12
portions of bruschetta. Participants must buy the wine from the vineyard (est. $20 a
bottle). So if each couple or every 2 people split a bottle,
the night is affordable. If it rains, there is indoor seating.
We could arrange for a handful of us to get there earlier if
that's a concern."

Another idea is we'll all chip in $5, and get pizzas.

Think it over. If you are interested and free on Saturday June 26th, RSVP YES and more details about that day will be forthcoming.

If you would like to check out there website click on the link below.

http://www.gouveiavin...
item.name: Afternoon Delight at Gouveia Vineyards - Walingford, CT
